name: THC-A 2 Gram Pre Roll | 2 Count
description:
The ultimate indulgence for enthusiasts. Each pack contains two 2-gram pre-rolls packed with premium indoor flower boasting a whopping 42% THC-A content.

These pre-rolls are made with the finest indoor-grown flower, ensuring a smooth, flavorful smoking experience with every puff. Enjoy the rich, complex flavors of our terpene-infused pre-rolls, available in a variety of mouthwatering strains.

10 per pack
